vsParam:
Lydie, what's wrong with you?
Why are you squatting over there?

I am doing... deep squat...
Hmmmm!

Deep squat?
What you are doing is not deep squat...

Ah ha ha... But, why do you suddenly want to do this?
Anything wrong?

Nothing's wrong, it's just...
I know I don't have enough strength...

I don't want to cause you any troubles,
so I just want to do some physical exercise... Hmmm!

I told you this is going to work...
Right, Cresson?

The spirit of doing physical exercises for the sake of everyone...
Lydie, I deeply admire you!

Okay! With all due respect, let me train you!
Is that okay?

! O, okay!
Thank you very much, Drillmaster Cresson!

Mmm! So... The first step,
is to train muscles for real combats!

To do that, we are going to kill some monsters!
Lydie, start running!
... Cresson just disappears in a blink of an eye.

Oh...
Cresson has entered a strange state...

We can't just turn let them be...
I think it's better for us to... follow them?

Yes, I think so too...
Ah ha ha, let's do this...

Alright, go strike down that monster!
Go, Lydie!

O, okay!
I'll do my best, Drillmaster Cresson!

Victory! Lydie, how do you feel!
Can you feel the strength in this part of your body...

Puff, puff, gasp, gasp...
Eh-hem, this, this is not a good time... Gasp...

A, are you okay, Lydie?
Water, get some water! Drink it!

T, thank you...
Glug, glug... Poof, gasp...

Ah, yeah...
Her physical strength could be even weaker than Anis...

Oh, I see.
In this case...

I guess we have to begin with simple exercises and do it slowly...
Ah, uh, I am sorry, Lydie...

Although I just boasted about being your drillmaster...
Judging from the result, we have to do it slowly...

I, it's alright, never mind...
My physical strength is too weak...

And, I'll get stronger if I exercise step by step, right?
I'll do my best!

Yes. I will guide you.
You'll get stronger bit by bit!

Wow, Lydie is very motivated!
If she keeps it up, she'll be stronger than Anis pretty soon, right?

*Sob sob*, indeed...
But I can't lose to Lydie!

Ha-ha... Exercising is a good thing,
but you must not force yourselves...

That's right... I don't want to see
you become muscular.
